cause.description:
To Africa With Love, is an independant non-profit organization-- based upon, funded by and created through music and love. Collectively, they are international sponsors of eight children through "World Vision Canada" in various parts of Africa and one in Lebanon.
Year-long fundraisers followed by the finale concert at the end of each year continue to fill our 8 kids lives with love and beauty and the letters we recieve throughout the year, continue to tell us that COMPASSION is a main key to personal and global happiness.
1. Change the lives of Children in need in our world.
2. Inspire lives of Compassion.
3. Share the wealth of the lives we've been blessed with.
cause.mission: Change the World; One Child at a Time.
cause.name: To Africa With Love
